channel.title: CVE Feed for Peplink -- Surf SOHO HW1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Peplink -- Surf SOHO HW1

item.title: CVE-2023-27380|2024-08-02T12:09:43.429Z -- peplink -- surf%20soho%20hw1
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the admin.cgi USSD_send functionality of peplink Surf SOHO HW1 v6.3.5 (in QEMU). A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-34356|2024-08-02T16:10:06.648Z -- peplink -- surf%20soho%20hw1
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the data.cgi xfer_dns functionality of peplink Surf SOHO HW1 v6.3.5 (in QEMU). A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28381|2024-08-02T12:38:24.986Z -- peplink -- surf%20soho%20hw1
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the admin.cgi MVPN_trial_init functionality of peplink Surf SOHO HW1 v6.3.5 (in QEMU). A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-34354|2024-08-02T16:10:06.799Z -- peplink -- surf%20soho%20hw1
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the upload_brand.cgi functionality of peplink Surf SOHO HW1 v6.3.5 (in QEMU). A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to execution of arbitrary javascript in another user's browser. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-35194|2024-08-02T16:23:59.450Z -- peplink -- surf%20soho%20hw1
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the api.cgi cmd.mvpn.x509.write functionality of peplink Surf SOHO HW1 v6.3.5 (in QEMU). A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability is specifically for the `system` call in the file `/web/MANGA/cgi-bin/api.cgi` for firmware version 6.3.5 at offset `0x4bde44`.

item.title: CVE-2023-35193|2024-08-02T16:23:59.650Z -- peplink -- surf%20soho%20hw1
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the api.cgi cmd.mvpn.x509.write functionality of peplink Surf SOHO HW1 v6.3.5 (in QEMU). A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to command execution. An attacker can make an authenticated HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability is specifically for the `system` call in the file `/web/MANGA/cgi-bin/api.cgi` for firmware version 6.3.5 at offset 0x4bddb8.
